title: Alright
lyrics:
When you're feeling low
And there's no-one around
When it looks like it's overand life got you down
Hold on to me brother
I'll be here if you need
A brighter day is coming

I truly believe



That everything

Everything is gonna be alright

(everything)

Everything is gonna be alright

When you're feeling low

And you can't see the light

(everything)

Everything is gonna be alright



See i know it's hard

Things are moving so fast

With the way that we're living

Nothing seems to last

Look out for each other

Everybody's a need

If you can show a little kindness

The I truly believe



That everything

Everything is gonna be alright

(everything)

Everything is gonna be alright

When you're feeling low

And you can't see the light

(everything)

Everything is gonna be alright



Everything

Everything is gonna be alright

Everything

Let me tell you everything



Everything is gonna be alright

(everything)

Everything is gonna be alright

When you're feeling low

And you can't see the light

(everything)

Everything is gonna be alright



In the morning

In the evening

In the night

You know your name

Everything and everything

Everything is gonna be alright

(Be alright)
